titleStmt.title: Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into (English)

publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org
publicationStmt.availability: This work is in the public domain

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project
Translation of 春秋公羊傳 into English.

p.seg: In the Annals the attacker is called kè
and the attackee is called kè. 何休注:伐人者為客，讀伐長言之，齊人語也。見伐者為主，讀伐短言之，齊人語也。"
In the case of jí, one desires it (scil. the joining together)
